Name: Nouakchott
Description: Nouakchott is the largest city in and capital of Mauritania.

Name: Atar
Description: Atar is a city in Saharan Mauritania.

Name: Chinguetti
Description: Chinguetti is a city in Saharan Mauritania. It contains a noted Islamic scholarly centre sometimes called the library in the desert and is a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Name: Nouadhibou
Description: Nouadhibou is the second largest city in Mauritania. It's a major fishing centre and large industrial port.

Name: Tichit
Description: Tichit is a town in Mauritania.
